/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Trees line the street, their leaves rustling in the breeze, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
